statements: SELECT * FROM flood_forecast WHERE location = 'City A';
SELECT location, flood_likelihood FROM flood_forecast WHERE date = '2022-10-15';
SELECT date, estimated_losses FROM flood_forecast WHERE flood_likelihood > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM flood_forecast WHERE reinsurance_strategy = 'Optimal';
SELECT location, estimated_losses, reinsurance_strategy FROM flood_forecast WHERE estimated_losses > 10000;
SELECT * FROM flood_forecast WHERE location = 'New York' ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT location, flood_likelihood FROM flood_forecast WHERE estimated_losses > 10000;
SELECT AVG(flood_likelihood) AS average_likelihood, reinsurance_strategy FROM flood_forecast GROUP BY reinsurance_strategy;
SELECT date, location, flood_likelihood, estimated_losses FROM flood_forecast WHERE flood_likelihood > 0.75 ORDER BY estimated_losses DESC;
SELECT location, SUM(estimated_losses) AS total_losses FROM flood_forecast GROUP BY location HAVING total_losses > 50000;
SELECT * FROM flood_occurrences WHERE severity > 3;
SELECT id, location, date FROM flood_occurrences ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, premium FROM reinsurance_strategies WHERE risk_coverage > 0.5;
SELECT location, date, severity FROM flood_occurrences WHERE severity BETWEEN 2 AND 4;
SELECT id, strategy_name, risk_coverage FROM reinsurance_strategies ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM flood_occurrences WHERE severity > 5 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT location, date FROM flood_occurrences WHERE location = 'New York' AND severity > 3;
SELECT location, severity, DATE_FORMAT(date, '%Y-%m-%d') AS formatted_date FROM flood_occurrences WHERE severity BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT id, strategy_name, risk_coverage*premium AS total_coverage_cost FROM reinsurance_strategies WHERE risk_coverage > 0.5 ORDER BY total_coverage_cost DESC;
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS occurrence_count FROM flood_occurrences GROUP BY location ORDER BY occurrence_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM FloodOccurrences;
SELECT location, date, severity FROM FloodOccurrences WHERE severity = 'High';
SELECT id, location FROM LossEstimations ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, risk_profile, target_coverage FROM ReinsuranceStrategies WHERE target_coverage > 0.5;
SELECT date, estimated_loss FROM LossEstimations WHERE estimated_loss > 10000 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT * FROM FloodOccurrences WHERE severity='High' ORDER BY date DESC, forecasted_depth DESC
SELECT location, date FROM LossEstimations WHERE estimated_loss > 10000 ORDER BY estimated_loss DESC
SELECT location, risk_profile, target_coverage FROM ReinsuranceStrategies WHERE premium_rate < 0.05 ORDER BY risk_profile
SELECT id, location, date, severity FROM FloodOccurrences WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY location ASC, date DESC
SELECT * FROM LossEstimations WHERE affected_area > 5000 ORDER BY affected_area DESC, date ASC
SELECT * FROM FloodOccurrence;
SELECT id, location, date FROM LossEstimation ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT location, estimated_loss FROM LossEstimation WHERE estimated_loss > 10000;
SELECT strategy_name, premium FROM ReinsuranceStrategy ORDER BY premium DESC;
SELECT * FROM PredictiveModel WHERE algorithm = 'Random Forest';
SELECT * FROM FloodOccurrence ORDER BY severity DESC;
SELECT id, location, date FROM LossEstimation WHERE estimated_loss > 10000;
SELECT location, estimated_loss FROM LossEstimation WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT strategy_name, coverage_amount, premium FROM ReinsuranceStrategy WHERE coverage_amount >= 500000 AND premium < 2000 ORDER BY coverage_amount ASC;
SELECT model_name, algorithm FROM PredictiveModel WHERE trained_on < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM flood_occurrences;
SELECT location, date FROM flood_occurrences WHERE severity > 3;
SELECT id, location, estimated_amount FROM estimated_losses WHERE cause='Heavy Rain';
SELECT company_name, strategy_description FROM reinsurance_strategies ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT location, damage_amount FROM historical_data WHERE event_type='Flood' AND damage_amount > 10000 ORDER BY damage_amount DESC;
SELECT id, location, date, severity FROM flood_occurrences WHERE severity > 5 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM estimated_losses WHERE cause = 'Heavy Rain' AND estimated_amount > 10000
SELECT location, event_type, damage_amount FROM historical_data WHERE event_type = 'Flood' AND damage_amount >= 5000 ORDER BY damage_amount DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT company_name, strategy_description FROM reinsurance_strategies WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(strategy_description) > 100 ORDER BY company_name ASC
SELECT id, date, forecasted_severity, confidence_level FROM flood_forecasts WHERE date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY forecasted_severity DESC
